name: Samsung Galaxy A03
description: The Samsung Galaxy A03 is a low-end smartphone ideal for users looking for a budget device. It has a 6.5-inch display, an octa-core processor, 3GB of RAM, and a 5000 mAh battery that offers great autonomy. The main camera is 48MP, which is quite impressive for its category.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 11
description: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 is a mid-range device that offers excellent value for money. It features a 6.43-inch AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 680 processor, 4GB of RAM, and a 5000 mAh battery with 33W fast charging. Its quad camera has a 50MP main sensor.

name: Motorola Moto G13
description: The Moto G13 is known for its impressive battery life thanks to its 5000 mAh battery, which can last up to three days with moderate use. It has a 6.5-inch display, a MediaTek Helio G37 processor, 4GB of RAM and 64GB of internal storage. Its main camera is 50MP, offering good photos for its price.

name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro is one of Apple's most advanced devices, with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, the powerful A15 Bionic chip, and a 12MP triple camera system that includes an ultra wide-angle, wide-angle and telephoto lens.
